headline: Baker Hughes (BKR): Evaluating Valuation Gaps and Analyst Optimism Following Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Baker Hughes (BKR) shares have seen some movement in recent sessions, with investors keeping an eye on performance trends over the past month. The company’s fundamentals provide insight into how energy sector names are being evaluated at the moment. See our latest analysis for Baker Hughes. Baker Hughes has experienced some volatility lately, but taking a broader view shows healthy momentum, with a 1-year total shareholder return of 22.12% and 111.45% over three years. headline: Basin rig count down one as prices slide
summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was down one this week, the latest count Friday by Baker Hughes shows, with 250 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 304 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is down two from last week at 547 rigs. A year ago, 586 rigs were active. The count shows that 418 rigs sought oil, down four from the previous week, and 120 explored ...
